channel.title: Teaches on Frederick Solt
channel.description: Recent content in Teaches on Frederick Solt

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Teaching I teach undergraduate and graduate courses on comparative politics and quantitative methods. Current students should refer to [ICON](“https://icon.uiowa.edu/") for the most up-to-date information on their courses. Fall 2015 POLI 2415: Latin American Politics POLI 7450: The Politics of Economic Inequality Spring 2016 POLI 1400: Introduction to Comparative Politics POLI 3450: The Politics of Economic Inequality Fall 2016 POLI 2415: Latin American Politics POLI 7002⁄7450: Computational Methods for Comparative Politics
